extendedInfo.description: The program is intended for preservation of history and construction of a family tree of a family. With its help you will establish the detailed list of members of a family, will add their biographies, a photo and video materials. The program is simple and easy in development.Program functions:- Drawing up of the biography of each member of a family;- Preservation of history of a family and person;- Construction of a general family tree;- Construction of a personal genealogical branch;- Drawing up of the generate lists;- Drawing up of the picture album of a family;- Drawing up of the video album of a family;- Storage of copies of documents;- Birthday Reminder;- Archiving and decompressing a ZIP;- Import/Export GEDCOM.

reviews.title: Too Glitchy!

reviews.title: Won\'t import my GED\'s    *** FIXED! in v.133
reviews.comment: I tried several different GED files generated by Personal Ancestral file, but none would work.  Every time I got a \"Force Close\" error.    ***********  Soon after I posted my original review, which also should have said that I tried the app on a Velocity Micro Cruz R102 e-reader tablet, the author emailed me about the problem.  I sent him a couple of small GED files, and he fixed the problem the next day.     The app is unfortunately very slow with my GED file with 2200 people, but it does work nicely.  It took about 15 minutes to import the GED file (use the SETTINGS).  I tried having it draw a tree, too.  After 30 minutes, it seemed stuck at 74%, but half an hour later it said 75%.  I powered it down to quit and start over.  With a smaller GEDCOM, like 286 people, it works very well.  An impressive piece of work!     On the main screen, there\'s a \"Tree\" icon which draws a descendants chart of the selected person, and an icon showing 3 little people, and that one makes a descendancy list.       So far, there\'s no user\'s manual, but with some trial and error, you can figure out what it does and how to do it.  Just start with a small GEDCOM, like under 100 individuals, for learning.
reviews.author: A Google User
